segments.text: Well , it's too bad that we like different kinds of movies . Maybe we're just different kinds of people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah it's too bad ... but actually I think I know what to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can go to a horror movie , and I'll hold your hand so you don't get scared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean ... like on a second date ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! Or are you still too scared !
segments.speaker: S2
